parameters.name: Center
parameters.description: Array of 3 doubles(x1, y1, z1) in meters that describe the ellipse center

parameters.name: Major
parameters.description: Array of 3 doubles (x1, y1, z1) in meters that describe a point on the ellipse and on the major axis

parameters.name: Minor
parameters.description: Array of 3 doubles (x1, y1, z1) in meters that describe a point on the ellipse and on the minor axis

parameters.name: Start
parameters.description: Array of 3 doubles (x1, y1, z1) in meters that describe the start point of the ellipse

parameters.name: End
parameters.description: Array of 3 doubles (x1, y1, z1) in meters that describe the end point of the ellipse

title: IModelDoc2.CreateEllipticalArcByCenter
signature:
System.Boolean CreateEllipticalArcByCenter( 
   System.Object
Center
,
   System.Object
Major
,
   System.Object
Minor
,
   System.Object
Start
,
   System.Object
End
)

parameters.name: Center
parameters.description: Array of 3 doubles(x1, y1, z1) in meters that describe the ellipse center

parameters.name: Major
parameters.description: Array of 3 doubles (x1, y1, z1) in meters that describe a point on the ellipse and on the major axis

parameters.name: Minor
parameters.description: Array of 3 doubles (x1, y1, z1) in meters that describe a point on the ellipse and on the minor axis

parameters.name: Start
parameters.description: Array of 3 doubles (x1, y1, z1) in meters that describe the start point of the ellipse

parameters.name: End
parameters.description: Array of 3 doubles (x1, y1, z1) in meters that describe the end point of the ellipse

returns: True if successfully created, false otherwise
remarks: The Start and End arguments should be specified in a counter-clockwise (CCW) manner.
